name: devs-marketplace
description: CodeForge plugin marketplace for development tools

plugins.name: codeforge-lsp
plugins.description: LSP servers for CodeForge (Python, TypeScript, Go)

plugins.name: ticket-workflow
plugins.description: EARS-based ticket workflow with GitHub integration

plugins.name: notify-hook
plugins.description: Desktop notifications and audio chime when Claude finishes responding

plugins.name: dangerous-command-blocker
plugins.description: Blocks dangerous bash commands (rm -rf, sudo rm, chmod 777, force push)

plugins.name: protected-files-guard
plugins.description: Blocks modifications to .env, lock files, .git/, and credentials

plugins.name: auto-formatter
plugins.description: Batch-formats edited files at Stop (Ruff for Python, gofmt for Go, Biome for JS/TS/CSS/JSON/GraphQL/HTML, shfmt for Shell, dprint for Markdown/YAML/TOML/Dockerfile, rustfmt for Rust)

plugins.name: auto-linter
plugins.description: Auto-lints edited files at Stop (Pyright + Ruff for Python, Biome for JS/TS/CSS/GraphQL, ShellCheck for Shell, go vet for Go, hadolint for Dockerfile, clippy for Rust)

plugins.name: code-directive
plugins.description: 17 custom agents, 16 coding skills, agent redirection, syntax validation, and skill auto-suggestion
